title: Resetting Your Password
body: To reset your password, navigate to the login screen and click on 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions sent to your registered email.

title: Account Recovery Options
body: If you no longer have access to your email, contact the IT helpdesk to verify your identity and recover your account.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Setup
body: Enable 2FA by going to your account settings and choosing 'Security'. Select your preferred second-factor method (e.g., SMS, Authenticator App).

title: Changing Your Username
body: Username changes can only be requested through your HR administrator. Submit a username change form via the internal HR portal.

title: Resetting MFA Device
body: If you lost your MFA device, contact security to reset your multi-factor authentication settings and re-enroll.
